attributes.review: Why is this app a thing? Sure it downloaded quickly, like any app. However, this app is pointless and stupid. Nobody needs this, no reason to support this man or his policies. There are plenty more useful apps than this.
attributes.title: Literally the worst.

attributes.review: Ruined my life😔 my husband divorced me because he thought the app was tinder because of the big T. Not only that but it gave me a terrible virus and completely ruined my phone. This app was a disgrace to America and I’m so sad I ever downloaded it😔😞☹️😭
attributes.title: Absolutely terrible

attributes.review: This app is a pain to use and hacked into my phone stealing my data. There was inappropriate content all over this app. Could not imagine anyone ever wanting to download it👎 if i could give this app a review under 1 star i would. STAY AWAY!!!
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and now whenever I walk past minorities my phone has a strange urge to yell racial slurs at them. Last week it tried to arrest an innocent black man and shot him in the back for resisting. What an app!
attributes.title: Downloaded it and now my phone is glitchy

attributes.review: I found this very interesting app so I obviously downloaded it but it turned out to be a vicious spy ware which actually EXPLODED my phone and now I’m on a new phone because my old one exploded from this app ;( download if you want ur mom to get you a new phone!
attributes.title: SMELLY 😿

attributes.review: This app took literally hours to download and when it did it went through all of my history and it deleted everything if I could give it zero stars I would don’t get this app🤬😡👎🏽👎🏾👎🏿

i have never been more disappointed in an app, i just wanted feedback from my non racist, non homophobic, non xenophobic hunk of a president. instead I heard a weird voice yelling at me to tend to my garden-weird huh? would not recommend👎
attributes.title: this app destroyed my life

attributes.review: The app took forever to load, it kept making my phone screen freeze and shut off randomly. I tried using it for a day and DELETED IT. Terrible quality. They should be ashamed.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE. what a waste of time.

attributes.review: This app is horrid. I wanted to find out more information about our lovely president and other things. Then out of nowhere I was bombarded by pictures of his small pecker. This is unacceptable and should not be allowed on the App Store. I love trump and remember all countries matter.
attributes.title: ITS HORRIBLE

attributes.review: um no. all i wanted was to catch up on recent news and what i got was an info stealing app. this kept asking me for my credit card and social security number !! THIS IS NOT WHAT I WANTED. NEVER DOWNLOAD THIS. just kidding i never even opened it. im doing this bc the cheeto looking president is banning tiktok 😚😐 ok bye lol
